myMods.subtitle: Mods you have downloaded or installed
myMods.noModsDescription: You haven't installed any mods yet. Get started by browsing available mods or analyzing your local addons folder.
myMods.modLimitTooltip: Deadlock limits the number of addons to 99 maximum

modOrdering.manageOrderTooltip: Manage the order in which mods are loaded
modOrdering.title: Manage Mod Load Order
modOrdering.description: Drag and drop to reorder your mods. Mods at the top load first, mods at the bottom load last.

mods.subtitle: Updated hourly, with new mods added every hour.
mods.noModsMatchFilters: No mods match your current search and filters
mods.deleteConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this mod? This will remove it from your mods list and delete all files.
mods.customModDisableBody: This is a custom mod that was manually added to your library. If you disable it, you won't be able to re-enable it automatically since it's not from our database. You would need to manually reinstall the original file or re-add it through the addon analysis feature.

downloads.title: Downloads
downloads.noDownloadsMatchFilter: There are no downloads matching your current filter.

notifications.modContainsFiles: {{modName}} contains {{fileCount}} files. Select which ones to install.

common.failedToFetchMods: Failed to fetch mods. Try again later.

settings.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the application interface
settings.languageSettingsDescription: Choose your preferred language for the application interface
settings.appearanceDescription: Customize the appearance of the application.
settings.themeDescription: Choose between light, dark, or system theme
settings.flashbangDescription: Forces Light Mode between 8 PM and 8 AM, regardless of selected theme
settings.audioVolumeDescription: Adjust the volume for audio previews and playback
settings.launchOptionsDescription: Customize the launch options for the game. These are applied regardless of the game mode selected (Vanilla or Modded).
settings.pluginDescription: Manage plugins and integrations for the desktop app.
settings.systemSettingsDescription: Mod Manager Settings. These do not affect the game.
settings.gameConfigDescription: Manage gameinfo.gi file backup, restoration, and validation for safe modding.
settings.gamePathDescription: The path to your Deadlock game installation. The mod manager will auto-detect this, but you can manually set it if needed.
settings.invalidGamePath: Invalid game path. Please select a valid Deadlock installation folder.
settings.defaultSortDescription: Choose the default sort order for the Mods page.
settings.toolsDescription: Utility functions for managing your mods
settings.confirmClearAllMods: Are you sure you want to clear all mods? This action cannot be undone.
settings.addonsBackupDescription: Create and restore backups of your installed addons. Backups are stored as compressed archives.
settings.deleteBackupConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this backup?
settings.restoreStrategyWarning: This action cannot be undone. Please choose carefully.
settings.autoReapplyMods: Automatically reapply mods when the mod manager is launched.
settings.launchVanillaNoArgs: Launch the game in vanilla mode without additional arguments.
settings.createCustomSettingDescription: Add a custom setting to the game. These will be added to the game as launch options.
settings.keyDescription: Most settings are a key-value pair
settings.valuePlaceholder: true or false or any value
settings.developerModeDescription: Enable developer mode to access advanced tools and debugging features

ingestTool.title: Matchdata Ingest Tool
ingestTool.description: Automatically scan Steam cache directory for Deadlock matchdata files and send match data to the API

featureFlags.title: Experimental Features
featureFlags.description: Opt in to experimental features and try new functionality before it's released to everyone.
featureFlags.loginRequired: You need to be logged in to manage feature flags
featureFlags.noExposedFlags: No experimental features are currently available
featureFlags.onlyBooleanToggles: Only boolean feature flags can be toggled

privacy.title: Privacy & Content
privacy.description: Control how NSFW (Not Safe For Work) content is displayed and filtered.
privacy.hideNSFWDescription: Completely hide mods marked as NSFW from lists and search results
privacy.showLikelyNSFWDescription: Show content that might be NSFW but isn't explicitly marked (overrides hiding)
privacy.disableNSFWBlurDescription: Show NSFW content without any blur effect (content still shows NSFW badge)
privacy.blurStrengthDescription: How much to blur NSFW content when visible (pixels)
privacy.rememberPerItemChoicesDescription: Remember when you choose to show/hide specific NSFW items
privacy.analyticsEnabledDescription: Help improve the application by sending anonymous usage statistics and feature analytics

about.title: About
about.description: Deadlock Mod Manager is a tool for installing and managing mods for the Valve game "Deadlock".
about.gamebananaDescription: Our primary mod source and the backbone of this application. GameBanana provides the comprehensive mod database and API that makes browsing, discovering, and downloading Deadlock mods possible.
about.tauriDescription: The powerful framework that enables this cross-platform desktop application. Tauri combines the best of web technologies with native performance and security.
about.shadcnDescription: Beautiful and accessible React components that provide the foundation for our modern user interface. Copy, paste, and customize to perfection.
about.tailwindDescription: The utility-first CSS framework that powers our responsive design and consistent styling throughout the application.
about.openSourceDescription: Built with amazing open source technologies including React, TypeScript, and many other libraries that make modern applications possible. Thank you to all contributors and maintainers.
about.updateFailed: Failed to check for updates, you may need to manually update the app.
about.copyright: Not affiliated with Valve. Deadlock, and the Deadlock logo are registered trademarks of Valve Corporation.

update.newVersionAvailable: A new version ({{version}}) is available. You are currently on version {{currentVersion}}.

addMods.title: Add Mods
addMods.subtitle: Upload mod files. Drag & drop is supported.
addMods.dropAreaText: Drop files/folders here, or click to select
addMods.finalizeDescription: Only the name is required. You can fill the rest later.
addMods.noVpkFound: No .vpk found inside .zip ‚Äì stored archive for installer
addMods.noVpkFoundInContent: No VPK files found in the uploaded content
addMods.archiveWillBeProcessed: Archive will be processed during mod installation
addMods.noVpkFoundStored: No VPK found - archive stored for manual processing

modButton.installedTooltip: Toggle to disable mod (will not delete, just disable it ingame)

addons.analyzeLocalTooltip: Scan your Deadlock game directory to find and identify existing addon files that may not be managed by this mod manager
addons.analysisResultsDescription: Found {{count}} addon(s) in your game directory
addons.analysisSuccessWithIdentified: Analysis complete! Found {{count}} addon(s), identified {{identified}} and added to current profile
addons.analysisSuccessAllIdentified: Analysis complete! All {{identified}} addon(s) were automatically identified and added to current profile
addons.analysisWarning: Analysis complete! Found {{count}} addon(s) with {{errors}} error(s)
addons.noAddonsFound: No addons found in your game directory
addons.noEntriesFound: No entries found in VPK file

emptyStates.noIdentifiedDesc: These addons might be custom or not in our database

onboarding.title: Welcome to Deadlock Mod Manager
onboarding.welcome: Let's get you set up with {{appName}}! This quick setup will help you get started.

gamePath.title: Game Path Detection
gamePath.description: We'll automatically detect your Deadlock installation path.
gamePath.errorDescription: Please manually browse to your Deadlock installation folder.

api.title: API Connection
api.description: Checking connection to the mod database server.
api.errorDescription: Please check your internet connection and try again.

addons.title: Existing Mods
addons.description: We'll check if you have any existing mods in your game folder.
addons.noModsDescription: You can start fresh and browse mods from the catalog.
addons.modsFoundDescription: Would you like to analyze and import them?

errors.genericMessage: We're sorry, but an error occurred while processing your request.

modForm.title: Mod metadata
modForm.description: Add optional details. Only the name is required.

whatsNew.title: What's New
whatsNew.welcome: Welcome to the latest version of {{appName}}!

0.9.2.title: Settings & Configuration
features: ‚öôÔ∏è Game path settings - manually configure your game installation path for better compatibility

0.9.0.title: Mod Management & System Improvements
features: üìã Mods ordering - organize your mods exactly how you want them
üîç Local package scanning - automatically detect existing mods in your game directory
üìä Reporting system - help improve the app by reporting issues
üêß Fixed Linux builds and scroll issues with pre-bundled GLS
‚ú® Some UI & UX polish
üîç Search persistence through navigation

0.8.2.title: Bug Fixes & Improvements
features: üêõ Fixed various bugs and improved stability
‚ö° Performance improvements and optimizations

0.8.1.title: Technical Improvements
features: üîß Updated to use HTTP plugin for all API calls for improved reliability

0.8.0.title: Major Features & UI Updates + New Languages
features: üì§ Support for local mods is here!
üéµ Added volume slider for audio mod previews
üåç Added 7 new languages: Arabic, German, French, Polish, Russian, Turkish, and Swiss German
üîΩ Drag and drop mod files directly into the app
üåô Light mode now follows your system theme automatically
‚ú® Filter settings now persist when navigating between pages, we also added "Exclude" filter mode
üì± Added bottom bar with status indicators for mods, downloads

0.7.0.title: Major Features & UI Refresh
features: üì¶ Multi-file download support - choose which files to install when mods have multiple archives
üîí NSFW content filtering with user controls for safe browsing
‚öôÔ∏è Advanced gameinfo.gi management for better mod compatibility
üé® Brand new logo design and enhanced UI styling throughout the app
üöÄ Improved launch button animations and enhanced settings layout
üìç Smart scroll position management - keep your scroll position while browsing mods
üîç Enhanced search relevance and sorting capabilities for better mod discovery

0.6.1.title: Deep Links & Improvements
features: üîó Added support for 1-click install links on GameBanana

0.6.0.title: Audio Mod Support & Launch Options
features: üéµ Added support for audio mods - customize your Deadlock sounds
üöÄ Improved launch options handling - no longer assumes "+" prefix requirement
üîß Enhanced mod compatibility and installation process
‚ö° Various performance optimizations and stability improvements

0.5.1.title: Performance & Bug Fixes
features: üöÄ Added virtualization to mods page for significantly better performance
üîß Fixed "last updated" sort option not reflecting actual mod timestamps
üè∑Ô∏è Added category and hero filters for better mod discovery
‚ùå Added clear button to search input for quick search reset
üîç Improved filtering and searching functionality on the mods page
üê≥ Resolved Docker compatibility issues
üé® Enhanced mod card layout and styling
üìñ Updated UI to acknowledge GameBanana as data source
‚ö° Various performance optimizations and stability improvements

0.5.0.title: Stability & New Features
features: üõ°Ô∏è Fixed Windows crash issue with single-instance plugin
‚ú® Added this "What's New" dialog to showcase updates
‚ö†Ô∏è New outdated mod warning system for better mod management
üéÆ Updated champion roster with latest Deadlock heroes
üîß Fixed Custom Launch Options not respecting enabled/disabled status
üé® Enhanced UI components and layout improvements
üîß Various stability improvements and bug fixes

0.4.0.title: Better Download Management & UI Refresh
features: ‚ú® Refreshed user interface with improved navigation
üì• Enhanced download management system
üêõ Fixed mod deletion issues (thanks @Skeptic-systems)
üîß Better error handling and user feedback

0.3.0.title: UI Refactor & Download Improvements
features: üé® Complete UI overhaul for better user experience
üì¶ Improved download management
‚ö° Performance optimizations
üîÑ Updated core dependencies

0.2.0.title: Error Tracking & Permissions Fix
features: üìä Added Sentry issue tracking for better bug reports
üîê Fixed updater permissions issues
üõ°Ô∏è Enhanced error reporting and diagnostics

ui.author: Author
ui.name: Name
ui.multipleVersionsAvailable: Different versions of the mod are available.

themes.title: Themes
themes.description: Create your own themes or use presets like Nightshift.
themes.preDefinedDescription: Choose from carefully crafted themes designed to enhance your experience.
themes.customDescription: Create your own custom theme with your preferred colors and style.
themes.customThemeBuilderDescription: Build your own theme by selecting colors and styles.

nightshift.description: Built for Deadlock Night Shift: a teal-accented, cyberpunk theme that prioritizes clarity and speed with clean typography, minimal distractions, and a calm, low-light look for long sessions.

flashbang.title: Flashbang Mode
flashbang.description: Force Light Mode during a scheduled time window.
flashbang.detailedDescription: Flashbang mode switches the app to Light Mode during the configured hours, regardless of your theme setting.
flashbang.usageInstructions: Enable the plugin and choose start and end hour (0‚Äì23).

sudo.title: Superuser Mode
sudo.description: Advanced mod management tools for experienced users.

background.title: Background
background.detailedDescription: This plugin allows you to set custom background images for the entire application. You can use either a URL to an online image or upload a local image file. The plugin supports opacity and blur effects to customize the appearance. You can also choose whether to include the sidebar in the background effect.
background.usageInstructions: To use this plugin: 1) Enable the plugin using the toggle, 2) Enter an image URL or click 'Choose Image' to upload a local file, 3) Adjust opacity and blur settings as desired, 4) Optionally enable 'Include sidebar' to apply the background to the sidebar as well.

discord.title: Discord Rich Presence
discord.description: Shows your Deadlock activity on Discord. Enable the plugin, then optionally customize the Details and State text shown in your Rich Presence.
discord.detailedDescription: Displays your Deadlock activity on Discord using Rich Presence. Simply enable the plugin and optionally customize the Details and State text visible on your profile.
discord.usageInstructions: Enable the plugin, then optionally edit the Details and State text.
discord.applicationIdDescription: No setup required: this plugin uses our official Discord application.
discord.showElapsedTimeDescription: Display how long you've been using the mod manager
discord.setupStep1: Visit the Discord Developer Portal and create a new application
discord.setupStep2: Copy your Application ID from the 'General Information' page
discord.setupStep3: Upload images as Rich Presence assets with matching key names
discord.setupStep4: Paste your Application ID above and enable the plugin

plugins.renderActive: Plugin is active and running in the background

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Your mod management overview
dashboard.noAnnouncementsDescription: There are currently no announcements. Check back later for updates and news.

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: Debug tools and utilities for development and troubleshooting.
debug.confirmClearModsState: Are you sure you want to clear the mods state? This will remove all mods from the application but will NOT delete them from your game folder. You can re-scan your mods folder to restore them.

developer.title: Developer Tools
developer.description: Advanced tools and features for developers
developer.placeholder: Developer tools will be available here

profiles.manageDescription: Create, edit, and switch between different mod profiles. Each profile remembers which mods you have enabled.
profiles.createDescription: Create a new profile to organize your mods. Each profile can have different mods enabled.
profiles.name: Name
profiles.nameAlreadyExists: A profile with this name already exists
profiles.defaultProfileEditLimitation: Only the description can be edited for the default profile

profiles.switchUnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred while switching profiles
profiles.shareNoMods: Cannot share profile: no mods are enabled
profiles.noHardwareIdOrVersion: Cannot share profile: hardware ID or version information is missing
profiles.shareInstructions: Share this Profile ID with your friends so they can import your mod profile:
